channel.title: Help with shops.(Not noob)(Motififtyed come see)
channel.description:
Alright this is what happend. I went to make a PvP shop reward exchange. I have it added into wannaeshop, and everything else needed for pvp thing. I also have the coords down, and i have it selling with atlest a few items in it. What happens when i go to trade the gem merchant.(What i used for pvp shop) I dc. Any idea's on how to fix?
No need for picture death, as what it says when i dc is 2 short. "ClientHandler: Client Demon disconnected (localhost)"

item.title: Help with shops.(Not noob)(Motififtyed come see)
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Post the print out thats on the batch file when you disconnect.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with shops.(Not noob)(Motififtyed come see)
